        expression: AssignmentOperation(
            Assign {
                left: Variable(

                            span: Span(

                                1,
                            ),
                            name: "a",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                span: Span(
                    4,
                    4,
                ),
                right: LiteralInteger {
                    span: Span(
                        4,
                        6,
                    ),
                    value: "4",
                },
            },
        ),
        end: Span(
            4,
            7,
        ),
    },

        expression: AssignmentOperation(
            Assign {
                left: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                6,
                                1,
                            ),
                            name: "b",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                span: Span(
                    6,
                    4,
                ),
                right: Match {
                    keyword: Span(
                        6,
                        6,
                    ),
                    condition: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    6,
                                    13,
                                ),
                                name: "a",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    default: None,
                    arms: [],
                },
            },
        ),
        end: Span(
            7,
            2,
        ),
    },
]
